data.name: Building1
data.value:
Fighter Factory  allows you to build small fighter ships.

As you upgrade the Fighter Factory, building of ships becomes more efficient and you are able to build ships faster.

Remember that building an fleet is a time consuming process so it is a good idea to upgrade the Fighter Factory to a high level to minimize this time

data.name: Building10
data.value:
Engineering Bay  allows you to construct siege ships. You need siege ships to destroy the defenses of enemy planets. It is a very difficult and bloody task for an fleet to storm a well defended planet without the help of siege ships.

As you upgrade the Engineering Bay, your engineers become more efficient at constructing the ships, resulting in quicker production.

Remember that constructing siege ships is a costly and very time consuming process so it is a good idea to upgrade your Engineering Bay to a high level to minimize this time

data.name: Building11
data.value:
Transporter Station allows you to transport minerals between planets.

You can transport minerals between your own planets but you can also send minerals to other player's planets.

The higher the level of this building, the higher your transport capacity.

data.name: Building12
data.value:
Cantina, a gathering place for many interesting characters, including those that are good at... at not being seen when they choose not to. Just the type of patron you will want to recruit into your spy network! Therefore tavern allows you to recruit scouts.

Scouts are able to covertly learn details about other planets so they could prove a valuable asset to your war machine.

The higher the level of the cantina, the more patrons it attracts enabling you to recruit scouts much faster.

data.name: Building2
data.value:
Orbital Shipyard  allows you to build heavy warships.

As you upgrade the Orbital Shipyard, building of ships becomes more efficient and you are able to build faster.

Remember that building an fleet is a time consuming process so it is a good idea to upgrade the Orbital Shipyard to a high level to minimize this time

data.name: Building3
data.value:
Command Center  is where you give commands to your workers to construct or upgrade buildings on the planet.

You can also upgrade the Command Center building itself. As you upgrade the Command Center, the workers on your planet get more and more efficient and as a result, construction takes less and less time.

data.name: Building4
data.value:
Energy Shield protects the planet from attacks. The Energy Shield by itself does little to protect the planet, however the Energy Shield does improve the defensive ability of the ships defending the planet. The higher the level, the better job the Energy Shield does.

The Energy Shield can be damaged and/or destroyed with Ion Cannon Gunships.

data.name: Building5
data.value:
Mining Facility is the primary source of your construction. The Mining Facility produces a steady supply of minerals for you to build ships and buildings. The higher the level of the Mining Facility, the more minerals it yields per hour.

But be aware that minerals produced is stored in your Warehouse which has a storage limit so spend your minerals before the warehouse becomes full or your production will halt.

data.name: Building6
data.value: Warehouse is where you store your minerals. As minerals are produced, it is stored in the warehouse. However, the warehouse has a storage limit and when reached, your mining facility stops production. Therefore, it is a good idea to upgrade the warehouse to be able to store a fair amount of minerals.

data.name: Building7
data.value:
Defense Platform are orbiting defense structures that greatly improve the ability of the ships to defend the planet.

Defense Platform can be damaged and/or destroyed with Siege Ships.

data.name: Building8
data.value:
Power Plant is the source of energy. The Power Plant produces energy which allow you to power ships and support buildings on your planet.

Every building requires a certain amount energy to maintain. The higher the level of the building, the more energy you need.

The higher the level of the Power Plant, the more energy you are able to produce.

You can never build more ships, or upgrade buildings unless your power plant can support them.

data.name: Building9
data.value: Galactic Council  is where you entertain your guests and where poiliticians gather. The Galactic Councils are the perfect and necessary place to attract politicians to join your empire in performing the role of senators. Senators are necessary for you to take over another planet as they are the ones who convince the enemy's population to join your empire, and stay at the planet to govern it.

data.name: email_InviteAccepted_Subject
data.value: Hello from {0}. Thanks for the invite!!

data.name: email_InviteAccepted1_body
data.value:
Hey {0}!

This is {1} aka {2}, thanks for the invite!

I joined and accepted your invite while registering
{0}, This is an automated message telling you that your friend has joined the realm and has accepted your invite.

{2} has already been invited to your clan on your behalf.

Good luck to both of you!
Realm Of Empires team

data.name: email_InviteAccepted2_body
data.value:
Hey {0}!

This is {1} aka {2}, thanks for the invite!

I joined and accepted your invite while registering
{0}, This is an automated message telling you that your friend has joined the realm and has accepted your invite.

{2} has NOT been invited to your clan since you lack invite permission. Consider contacting your clan leaders and either ask them for an invite, or ask for invite permissions.

Good luck to both of you!
Realm of Empires team

data.name: email_KTitleInviteFriendsMsg_body
data.value:
Congratulations noble {0}!


Congratulation on your first step into nobility!


Since you have proven yourself as an adept player and know the game well, we would like to extend to you an exclusive offer, available to Nobility only - We would like to offer you a recruitment reward of 15 servants per Knight!! details...

Invite a friend and claim your reward when they reach a title of Knight/Dame! When your friend joins, you will get an email notifying you of this and hence will be able to mentor them on their way if you wish. details...

We are committed to rewarding your efforts to help us grow and actively look for new ways to offer premium features for free to the friends of realm of empires.


Once again, Congratulations and in advance, thank you for helping us grow and improve.


This is an automated message, please do not reply

data.name: email_KTitleInviteFriendsMsg_subject
data.value: Congratulations! Welcome to the nobility with its exclusive rights!

data.name: email1_body
data.value:
Congratulations oh mighty {0}!


Your hard work and dedication has paid off! A big congratulation from Realm Of Empires team!


By now you know the dynamics of the game well, and if you enjoy it, we would very much like to ask you to help us grow and improve by writing a very quick review. As a thank you, we'll reward your efforts with 10 servants. 5 star reviews are most welcome and appreciated, and they help us grow!


Please keep in mind that we are still in Beta and there are many more features and improvements to come!


Once again, Congratulations and in advance, thank you for helping us grow and improve.


This is an automated message, please do not reply

data.name: email1_subject
data.value: Congratulations and a gift!

data.name: tou
data.value:
Realm of Empires strives to be a fun, rewarding online gaming experience for everyone. It is expected that players treat each other with common courtesy and respect. In addition to following facebook’s terms of use, we reserve the right to suspend or terminate any account that engages in the following:

Malicious Intent
  • Attempting to deface or damage www.realmofempires.com
  • Spamming, excessive posting, or disrupting normal communication in the game or on the about page


    • Cheating
  • Creating multiple Facebook accounts – creating multiple accounts in game using multiple Facebook accounts is prohibited. Only one account per player per realm is allowed.
  • Logging in with other players facebook accounts (consensually or not) to play Realm of Empires on their behalf will be detected and is against TOU. Use the Stewardship feature (if available).
  • Creating an account for the sole purpose of aiding another account is strictly prohibited.
  • Using automated scripts (bots), including client side scripts like Greasemonkey scripts.
  • Exploiting a bug - A player that discovers a bug that gives him/her an unfair advantage is expected to report the bug to realmofempires.com immediately. Exploiting any bugs to your advantage is prohibited.


    • Posting offensive material
  • Any posts (emails, forum posts, village names, clan names, player names, etc) that are discriminatory in nature with regards to religion, race, sexual orientation, age, or sex will not be permitted.
  • Any posts that encourage, link to, or promote illegal activity.
  • Spamming the discussion boards to promote another game, business, political agenda or religious philosophy
  • Physically threatening a player is not allowed (although in-game threats of attacking are ok).
  • Insulting other players unless this is in regards to their gameplay ability.
  • No pornographic material (text or graphics) is allowed in Realm of Empires.


    • Language
  • All communication on Realm of Empires is expected to be in English so that everyone who plays can understand.
  • Use of abusive language or profanity may result in a suspension or termination


    • By accepting the terms of use, the player accepts the following:

    Servants
  • Servants are the in game currency used to unlock various premium features or the nobility package.
  • There are two types of servants transferable (typically purchased through paypal or completing offers) and non-transferable (typically given as gifts from other players, rewards from contests etc.)
  • Once acquired, servants are not redeemable for cash, all purchases are final, and no returns will be made.
  • Servants cannot be sold for real money to other players, or transfered to other players as bribes for any benefit in the game. For example, in exchange for silver, attacking other player(s), for villages, or to further one's propaganda.
  • A player whose account is terminated forfeits any outstanding servants they may have.
  • Availability and prices of any servant deals or packages may change at any time.


    • Copyright
    All images, text on the Realm of Empires application is the property of realmofempires.com. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

    Privacy
    RealmOfEmpires.com respects your privacy. We abide by facebook’s application policy which prohibits us from collecting and/or distributing any personal information about you outside of the game.

    Disclaimer
    Realm of Empires is provided as-is. www.realmofempires.com is not responsible for any losses incurred by the player, financial, emotional or otherwise. The Realm of Empires application will, on occasion, be unavailable for server maintenance, hardware and software upgrades. Realm of Empires may also experience unplanned outages due to circumstances beyond our control.

    RealmofEmpires.com reserves the right to amend or change the terms of use at anytime.

data.name: email_MsgToFriendUponRealmJoin_Body
data.value:
Hey {0}!

Hey! This is {1} aka {2}!

I just joined this realm as well! Happy gaming!!
{0}, This is an automated message telling you that your friend has joined this realm!

If you are an advanced player, consider helping your friend out. Perhaps you may enjoy mentoring them along, sharing your strategies and hard-earned lessons. Perhaps you are new, in which case you may benefit from guidance from your friend. Remember that this is first most a game of diplomacy and co-operation. It is designed so that working with others is the key to success.

To get in contact with your friend, simply reply to this message.

Good luck to both of you!
Realm Of Empires team

data.name: email_MsgToFriendUponRealmJoin_Subject
data.value: Hello from {0}!

data.name: SleepModeExplanation
data.value:
Sleep Mode allows you to prevent anyone from launching attacks on your planets while you are not at your computer.

- You can activate sleep mode once every {0} hours and this protection lasts for {1} hours.
- Once you activate the sleep mode, you have to wait {2} min before it actually comes to effect (during which time you can still get attacked).
- Once the sleep mode goes into effect no one will be able to launch an attack at you during this time. Attacks incoming before sleep mode is active will still land even during the sleep mode
- You may cancel the sleep mode anytime BUT you lose the remaining time of protection and must wait until sleep mode is available again to use it again.
- NOTE - Any attacks against you that are in progress will land, only new attacks will be prevented when sleep mode is enabled.

data.name: email_InviteReward

THANKS FOR INVITING - FROM THE REALM OF EMPIRES TEAM!!

Once again, thank you and we hope you are enjoying Realm of Empires as much as we enjoy making it for you!

data.value:
Congrats! You just got a reward of {1} servants for your standing in Friend Network Ranking

Please note that friend network ranking is refreshed once every few hours. Once you reach {0} friends, allow up to 24 hours for the next reward to be delivered (we got to pack the {1} servants in the cart, travel to your villages, avoid the wolves etc... takes a lot of work, so be patient! ;) This is an automated message, please do not reply.
